__An Amateur Artist Learning to Paint. This is the Journey__

My name is <span style="color: red;">Christian Bromley</span> and I'm a PhD student doing cancer research, but also an amateur artist. I've decided to build this website in order to showcase some of my artwork. I'm also an R programmer and am trying to code this website my myself so bare with me if it's a bit rough around the edges.

I started to paint during the first COVID-19 lockdown in 2020. At first, I was  doing landscapes, mostly made-up ones, but ever since, I have become obsessed with animals. Here's my favourite...

<img src="painting/true_deer.jpeg" style="width:50%">

If you have any comments about my paintings, any advice, any suggestions or any requests please go to my [instagram page](https://www.instagram.com/cbromley_artwork/) or drop me an email. I'm trying to find time to paint each week and I'm keen to learn!
